Title: 41958 - # Strategies to Keep the House Clean When You Have a Busy Family
Direction: 675 words. Explain that families can quickly make messes and it's hard to keep a house clean. Then, list 4-8 tips for busy families to stay on top of house cleaning. Some ideas include assigning chores to family members, creating a weekly cleaning schedule to break up tasks throughout the week, and choosing the best cleaning products to make cleaning faster. You can include the client link in the heading about cleaning products by mentioning purchasing them through Amway. Your audience is busy families.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: cleaning products from Amway
